title: TopCashback: Coupons & Codes
description:
TopCashback is proud to be the most generous cash back site!
Use this app when shopping online in order to get discounts (as cash back) at more than 4,000 popular stores in the United States, including Walmart, Macy’s, Staples, Best Buy and many more.
From fashion and electronics to travel and beauty, just click through to your favorite site via the TopCashback app and shop like normal.
This money-saving app is entirely free to use. Running for over 6 years in the USA with more than 2 million happy members, TopCashback is the country’s most generous cashback site.
Try it now and see the extensive list of retailers we work with.
TopCashback App Features:
- Join/Log into your TopCashback account
- Search 4,000+ stores and the cashback rates you can earn
- Browse by category
- Add online coupon codes
- View Trending Merchants
- Shop Top Offers
- See Recently Viewed Merchants
- View your recent earnings
- Favorite Stores List
- View your full account earnings
- Send referral links to friends and earn extra cash
- Update your main account details
This official TopCashback application complements our website www.topcashback.com
We really hope you enjoy using this app, however, if you do have any problems or suggestions for improvements, please let us know: http://www.topcashback.com/contact
Thanks!
